external_games.name: Star-Crossed Myth - The Department of Punishments -
Star-Crossed Myth: The Department of Punishments

name: Star-Crossed Myth: The Department of Punishments
storyline:
The lights of Tokyo blot out the stars. One night, you happen to notice a star sparkling in the heavens. Suddenly, the beautiful gods of the stars appear before you. These gods, however, have sinned. They've been thrown out of heaven.
You’re the only one who can erase their sins.

The gods have everything... except for love. Love blooms as you spend your days together, but that love is a forbidden one, a love that could change the world.
summary:
"It all started with a sin... Your love story with the frighteningly beautiful gods of the stars."

Contains the routes of:
* God of Libra, Zyglavis
* God of Scorpio, Scorpio
* God of Aries, Krioff
* God of Virgo, Partheno
* God of Gemini, Dui
* God of Pisces, Ichthys
